short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redeem the bonus channel points when the option pops up in twitch chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can tell it is working because it will say "STREAM CHAT (AUTO âœ…)" instead of just "STREAM CHAT" above the chat. It will take a few seconds to appear after a stream is loaded.

Open source at https://github.com/FrankSalmick/twitch-autoredeem

Report problems at https://github.com/FrankSalmick/twitch-autoredeem/issues
